faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle EBS R12 Project Accounting Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle EBS R12 Project Accounting Training covers key modules such as Project Foundation, Project Costing, Project Billing, and Project Management. These modules provide a complete understanding of managing financial and operational aspects of projects in Oracle EBS R12. A detailed syllabus is available in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour sessions each day. This schedule ensures consistent learning and hands-on practice with Oracle EBS R12 Project Accounting.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All sessions are scheduled Monday through Saturday to maintain consistent progress throughout the training.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer self-paced study. However, live doubt-clearing is not included with the self-paced option.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are available based on your performance in mock evaluations. These internships offer practical exposure to real-world Oracle Project Accounting scenarios.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle EBS R12 Project Accounting Training is offered as a complete package and modules are not available individually.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer resume-building support specific to Oracle Project Accounting roles, highlighting your ERP skills, project exposure, and training.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a laptop or desktop is required to install and access the Oracle EBS environment and complete hands-on project exercises.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is necessary. The course is beginner-friendly and ideal for those with a basic understanding of project, accounting, or finance concepts.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes. We start with fundamentals of project accounting and gradually move to advanced concepts, making it suitable for freshers and professionals alike.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete job placement support, including mock interviews, resume building, and interview preparation tailored to Project Accounting roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle EBS Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist in preparing for Oracle certification exams by providing study materials, expert guidance, and sample questions.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll have access to recorded sessions for 1 year and receive step-by-step documents and visual guides for each module.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We share module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interviews to prepare you for real-time project accounting roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. We provide 4 months of instance access for hands-on Oracle EBS R12 Project Accounting practice. Full installation guidance is included.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can rejoin any upcoming batch within your 1-year access period at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes. Upon successful completion, you’ll receive a Course Completion Certificate in Oracle EBS R12 Project Accounting from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding is needed. This is a functional training course focusing on configuring and managing project accounting processes in Oracle EBS.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, personalized 1-on-1 training is available on request. Please note that pricing will differ from group batch training.
